edu.stanford.nlp.optimization

Class SGDMinimizer<T extends Function>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.optimization.SGDMinimizer<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasEvaluators, Minimizer<T>

    public class SGDMinimizer<T extends Function>
extends Object
implements Minimizer<T>, HasEvaluators
    In place Stochastic Gradient Descent Minimizer.
    • Follows weight decay and tuning of learning parameter of crfsgd of Leon Bottou: http://leon.bottou.org/projects/sgd
    • Only supports L2 regularization (QUADRATIC)
    • Requires objective function to be an AbstractStochasticCachingDiffUpdateFunction.
    NOTE: unlike other minimizers, regularization is done in the minimizer, not the objective function. This class was previously called StochasticInPlaceMinimizer. This is now SGDMinimizer, and the old SGDMinimizer is now InefficientSGDMinimizer.
    Author:
    Angel Chang
